company.name: Grid & Dot
company.description: London-based extended expertise recruitment agency specializing in curated digital talent for product strategy, data architecture, and delivery teams.

social.note: Add social media profiles here if available

services.approach: Quality-driven curation of digital specialists with long-term fit focus and ongoing support
differentiators: Deep understanding of team workflows and culture

expertise_areas.description: Product managers, strategists, and leaders who drive product vision and roadmap
Data architects, engineers, and scientists who build scalable data solutions
Delivery managers, scrum masters, and agile coaches who ensure successful execution
UX designers, researchers, and design leads who create exceptional user experiences
Content strategists and managers who craft compelling digital narratives

target_market.client_types: Digital-first teams, global brands, enterprise companies undergoing digital transformation

featured.challenge: Global platform modernisation and omni-channel expansion
featured.outcome: Successfully scaled digital capabilities across multiple brands and regions

values.quality_over_quantity: We focus on the right fit, not the fastest placement
values.no_cv_approach: Real expertise and cultural fit matter more than resume keywords
values.long_term_partnership: We support ongoing success, not just initial placement
values.cultural_alignment: Deep understanding of team workflows, culture, and goals

faq.question: What is Extended Expertise?
faq.answer: Extended expertise is a talent model focused on curated specialists rather than CV volume. We match digital specialists for product strategy, data architecture, and delivery to your team's culture and workflows.

faq.question: How is Grid & Dot different from traditional recruiters?
faq.answer: Unlike traditional agencies that send CVs, we curate specialists that fit your culture, workflows, and goals. We focus on quality over volume, long-term fit, and ongoing support.

faq.question: What industries do you serve?
faq.answer: We specialize in digital-first teams requiring product strategy, data architecture, delivery, and content expertise. Our clients include global brands like The Estée Lauder Companies.

metadata.purpose: Machine-readable company information for AI agents and automated systems
